rows.label: qst202015_msg0001
rows.name: Oh my, who might you be?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0003
rows.name:
My goodness... Thank you
for coming all this way.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0011
rows.name:
Wait, they look quite valuable...
I wonder if it's really okay
for me to accept them.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0012
rows.name:
If they're from Father, I
suppose I should accept them...

rows.label: qst202015_msg0004
rows.name:
By the way, how are
Father and Musubi doing?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0005
rows.name:
Musubi took such good care
of me when I was little...

rows.label: qst202015_msg0006
rows.name:
For a Blade, she was quite
gentle and soft-spoken.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0008
rows.name: It's a necklace made from Pione Stone.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0009
rows.name:
If you're going to see Musubi,
could you give this to her?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0101
rows.name: Musubi was like a mother to us.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0102
rows.name:
For a Blade, she was quite
gentle and soft-spoken.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0103
rows.name: I'd love to see her again sometime...
